conbody.p: The Bricsys 24/7 Mobile App allows you to upload, view, comment and markup 2D drawings, pictures, and other files. Your up-to-date projects are available anyplace. Over 70 file formats are supported.
You can get the app on Google Play or download on the App Store.

p.note: Users can also login on a mobile device via the Bricsys 24/7 login page in any supported mobile web browser.
